item.title: Crime, Corruption, And Incompetence Pay Well For Leftist Big City Leaders
item.description: The nation’s largest cities, run by Democrats, are crime-infested, debt-ridden places making their liberal leaders a very good living.

item.title: ‘Trial By Ambush’: CNN Defamation Trial Gets Heated During Third Day Of Hearings
item.description: CNN also failed to include in their report that Young had successfully evacuated 22 women and one child out of Afghanistan.

item.title: Notre Dame Head Coach Shuts Down ESPN For Trying To Make His Team’s Victory About Race
item.description: Freeman hinted on Thursday night that the Fighting Irish’s path to the college football championship was not easy or skin-deep.

item.title: If Californians Don’t Fire Newsom, He’ll Burn What’s Left Of Their Home To The Ground
item.description: Gov. Gavin Newsom failed to prepare California for fires; L.A.’s fire chief was focused on making the fire department 'more diverse.'

item.title: Will 2025 Be The Year The West Frees Itself From All Justin Trudeaus?
item.description: The year 2025 doesn’t appear to favor Western leftist leaders, but it offers significant hope for a revitalization of Western civilization.
